00019 sub RQP_Render  {

00021     my $soap_som = pop;
00022     my $rh_params= $soap_som->method;

00024     local(*DEBUGLOG);

00031     my $output = "the first element is ". $self. " and the last ". ref($envelope)."\n\n";

00034     my %templatevars = @{$rh_params->{templatevars}};

00043     my $key         = "asdfasdfasdf";
00044

00046     my $problemSeed   =  (defined($templatevars->{envir}->{problemSeed}))   ? $templatevars->{envir}->{problemSeed}  : 1 ;
00047     my $psvn          =  (defined($templatevars->{envir}->{psvn})      )    ? $templatevars->{envir}->{psvn}         : 1234 ;
00048     my $problemStatus =  $templatevars->{problem_state}->{recorded_score}|| 0 ;
00049     my $problemValue  =  (defined($templatevars->{envir}->{problemValue}))   ? $templatevars->{envir}->{problemValue}  : 1 ;
00050     my $num_correct   =  $templatevars->{problem_state}->{num_correct}   || 0 ;
00051     my $num_incorrect =  $templatevars->{problem_state}->{num_incorrect} || 0 ;

00108 sub packRQParray {
00109     my $rh_hash=shift;
00110     my @array = ();
00111     foreach $key (keys %{$rh_hash}) {
00112         push @array, {identifier => $key, values => $rh_hash->{$key}};
00113     }
00114     \@array;
00115 }
00116 sub initializeDefaultSet {
00117     my $db = shift;
00118 
00119     my $setName       = 'set0';
00120     my $setRecord   = fake_set($db);
00121     $setRecord->set_id($setName);
00122     $setRecord->set_header("defaultHeader");
00123     $setRecord->hardcopy_header("defaultHeader");
00124     $setRecord->open_date(time()-60*60*24*7); #  one week ago
00125     $setRecord->due_date(time()+60*60*24*7*2); # in two weeks
00126     $setRecord->answer_date(time()+60*60*24*7*3); # in three weeks
00127     $setRecord->psvn(0);
00128     $setRecord;
00129 }
00130 
00131 sub initializeDefaultProblem {
00132         my $db                = shift;
00133         my $userName             = 'foobar';
00134         my $problemNumber        = 0;
00135         my $setName              = 'set0';

00137         $problemRecord->user_id($userName);
00138         $problemRecord->problem_id(0);
00139         $problemRecord->set_id($setName);

00141         $problemRecord->status(0);
00142         $problemRecord->value(1);
00143         $problemRecord->attempted(0);
00144         $problemRecord->last_answer('');

00146         $problemRecord->num_incorrect(0);
